statement.p: Explain how to find the dimension of W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} -2 \\ 0 \\ 3 \\ -1 \\ -2 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 3 \\ -1 \\ 1 \\ 0 \\ -2 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -3 \\ -1 \\ 10 \\ -3 \\ -8 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -10 \\ 0 \\ 15 \\ -5 \\ -10 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 1 \\ -2 \\ 0 \\ 3 \\ -4 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -33 \\ -1 \\ 55 \\ -18 \\ -38 \end{array}\right]\right\}.
